name: Ext_R5_Communication_sender
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Communication.sender for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Communication.sender from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Communication|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The entity (e.g. person, organization, clinical information system, or device) which is the source of the communication.
element.comment: `Communication.sender` maps to R4B `Communication.sender`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Endpoint)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CareTeam)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The entity (e.g. person, organization, clinical information system, or device) which is the source of the communication.
